comment._content: as you can almost see in his looks, he had an artistic personality, and he wrote in his own journals of his, at best, bisexual tendencies. This did not stop him from fathering 9 children, many of whom were murdered the day after the Czar by the Bolsheviks. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duke_Constantine_Constantinov...
